General.Name: Friend Co Ltd
General.Description: Friend Co.,Ltd. provides steel logistics supply chain services for medium and high-end automotive, home appliance, and other related enterprises. It offers procurement, processing, warehousing, trimming, packaging, transportation, and distribution services, as well as corresponding technical support services. The company provides galvanized steel, cold-rolled steel, hot-rolled steel, electrical steel, color-coated steel, aluminum sheet and other aluminum sheets, and related products. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Shanghai, China.
